content: I am a second year Computer Science PhD student at Boston University, currently advised by Professor Assaf Kfoury. Before coming here, I attained my Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science at the American University of Beirut, Lebanon. I am keenly interested in machine learning, deep learning, and computer vision. And I am currently working in research on explainable AI with Professor Sarah Adel Bargal.
summary: I am a second year Computer Science PhD student at Boston University, currently advised by Professor Assaf Kfoury. Before coming here, I attained my Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science at the American University of Beirut, Lebanon.
title: Diala Lteif
